attributes.action: allow pregnant women the choice between the swine flu vaccines Celvapan and Pandemrix
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pregnant women around the country are concerned at the choice of vaccine being offered against swine flu. Please allow pregnant women the choice between the two vaccines so that can be confident that we are doing the best for ourselves and our unborn children.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "allow pregnant women the choice between the swine flu vaccines Celvapan and Pandemrix."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21837


Prime Minister's Office
